channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous playground equipment and flooring, 19th August
item.description:
Playground equipment has been broken for weeks. Swing is broken/missing, as is the zip line. Other equipment is in a state of disrepair and the flooring is hazardous, with the surface coming away and gaps in many places. This is not a safe place for children to play.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpelier Avenue, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Help needed, 19th August
item.description:
Summary of the problem: There is always either a rubbish bin or fly-tipping left in front of the property. This happens regularly and causes an obstruction and nuisance. Request: Could you please check the area and take appropriate action, as this problem occurs all the time?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 220-222, Trafalgar Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Remove bikes from outside our homes, 19th August
item.description:
- remove these bikes immediately - we need to sleep at night - we couldn’t sleep during the weekend becouse of festival , last night because of noisy drunk people and bikes falling down - more than 20 bikes outside our home

item.title: Old type GPO manhole cover on pavement is cracked and falling down inside., 19th August
item.description:
Old type GPO manhole cover on pavement is cracked and falling inside. It's very dangerous as someone could fall. Especially dangerous for the blind or small children. Needs a barrier around it ASAP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clapham Common North Side, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass cuttings, 19th August
item.description:
Why would they leave grass cuttings just inside the entrance of Whitehall rec southlands rd exit entrance. To decompose it will end up being scattered all over the place also it’s very near to my back garden worried it will end up smelling like a compost heap. If I dumped my grass cuttings there I would be in trouble. I Pay for garden stickers to have my garden waste taken away or i book to take it to Churchfields . Why are you allowing this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, Southlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old tyres dumped in overgrowth, 19th August
item.description:

item.title: Pothole outside 3 Camborne Road, 19th August
item.description:
I am 28 weeks pregnant and while crossing the road I fell down into the road due to stepping onto this pothole. There were weeds growing out of the pothole which obscured how deep the hole is. As a result of catching my foot in the pothole I injured my ankle, however this could have been more serious and done damage to myself and my unborn baby. This pothole needs to be fixed urgently as it is a hazard. There were potholes next to this one a couple of months ago which were fixed but this one has been missed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camborne Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
